name: 透
text:
メイク薄いよって言われたんだよね
──お母さんが言うなって感じだけど
trans:
They told me I was wearing a small amount of makeup.
──It's like as if it was a comment from my mom.

name: 透
text:
一応、ビジュアルレッスン入れたいんだけど
今週どうかな
trans:
Just in case, I'd like to take visual lessons for a week.
If you're fine with that.

name: 透
text:
あ、いいの？
ふふっ、ありがと

name: 透
text:
あ、うん。わかってたよ
……ごめんね、急に
trans:
Ah, okay. Got it.
Sorry for asking suddenly.
